mapper.select: select * from (select Meet_no, MEET_THUMBNAIL, meet_title, meet_total, meet_margin, ROUND(NVL((select avg(NVL(review_star, 0)) from review r where r.meet_no = m.meet_no),0),1) review_star, (select count(meet_no) from review r where r.meet_no = m.meet_no) review_count from meet m where meet_type = 1 order by meet_margin desc) where rownum<=12 order by meet_margin desc,review_star desc
